src:
FOTO: Še en bankomat na udaru, silovita eksplozija zbudila Škofjote
06 Nov 2019, 08:39 by Danijel Cek

Neznanci so ponoči na Škofijah razstrelili bankomat in pobegnili. Policisti so obvestilo o tem prejeli zgodaj zjutraj, ob 4.30.



Škofjote, ki živijo v kompleksu ob cerkvi in okoliške prebivalce je ob 4.30 zbudila silovita eksplozija. Foto: Tomaž Primožič/FPA

ŠKOFIJE > Kot so nam povedali krajani, je bilo ob 4.30 slišati silovito eksplozijo, ki je zbudila vse stanovalce kompleksa nad pošto in poslovnimi prostori ob cerkvi v središču Škofij.
Številni so takoj stekli k oknom, da bi videli, kaj se je zgodilo. Nekateri so videli večji temnejši avto, ki je odpeljal po dovozni poti mimo cerkve. Opazili so tudi moškega, ki je stekel proti avtu. V rokah je poleg nočne svetilke držal še nekaj. Usedel se je v avto, ki je nato na glavni cesti zavil levo proti meji z Italijo.
Tokratna eksplozija je bila za razliko od tistih sredi oktobra v Črničah in junija v Senožečah zelo natančno odmerjena, saj ni hudo razdejala okoliških objektov, temveč le bankomat in pisarno zavarovalnice Triglav ob njem.
Koliko denarja so storilci odnesli, še ni znano. Policisti in kriminalisti intenzivno zbirajo informacije in opravljajo ogled kraja. Vse, ki bi v povezavi z dogodkom kaj videli, slišali ali opazili sumljiva vozila in osebe, prosijo, da to čim prej sporočijo na 113 ali na anonimni telefon policije 080 1200.



Eksplozija je poleg bankomata razdejala tudi pisarno zavarovalnice Triglav ob njem. Foto: Tomaž Primožič/FPA



Eksplozija je poleg bankomata razdejala tudi pisarno zavarovalnice Triglav ob njem. Foto: Tomaž Primožič/FPA



Koliko denarja so neznanci odnesli, še ni znano. Foto: Tomaž Primožič/FPA
text:
PHOTO: Another ATM Impacted, A Powerful Explosion Woke The Bishops
06 Nov 2019, 08:39 by Danijel Cek

Strangers blasted an ATM at Diocese at night and fled. Officers received a notice early this morning at 4:30 p.m.



The bishops who live in the complex next to the church and the surrounding residents were aroused by a violent explosion at 4.30. Photo: Tomaz Primozic / FPA

Dioceses> As the locals told us, at 4:30 there was a violent explosion that woke all the residents of the complex over the post office and business premises near the church in the center of the Dioceses.
Many immediately rushed to the windows to see what had happened. Some saw a larger darker car drive down the driveway past the church. They also noticed a man running toward the car. He was holding something besides the night lamp. He got into the car, which then turned left on the main road towards the border with Italy.
This time, the explosion, unlike those in mid-October in Črnice and in Senozeče in June, was very carefully measured, as it did not severely destroy the surrounding facilities, but only the ATM and the Triglav Insurance Company office near it.
How much money the perpetrators took away is not yet known. Police officers and criminals intensively gather information and tour the area. Anyone who would like to see, hear or notice any suspicious vehicles or persons in connection with the event is asked to report it as soon as possible to 113 or to the anonymous police telephone number 080 1200.



In addition to the ATM, the explosion also destroyed the office of Triglav Insurance Company. Photo: Tomaz Primozic / FPA



In addition to the ATM, the explosion also destroyed the office of Triglav Insurance Company. Photo: Tomaz Primozic / FPA



How much money the strangers have taken away is not yet known. Photo: Tomaz Primozic / FPA
